La_Mirada.California Graduate School of Theology:
The California Graduate School of Theology is an unaccredited institution of higher learning in Garden Grove, California.
History
The California Graduate School of Theology was founded and chartered in the state of California in 1968 by William S. McBirnie, an ordained Baptist pastor, author, and educator. It opened its doors one year later on the campus of the United Community Church in Glendale, CA. Classroom facilities and a beautiful library were built on the site.
